ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( MUSW__Type__c , 'Final Evaluation Review' ), ISPICKVAL( MUSW__Status__c , 'Completed'), NOT( ISBLANK( MUSW__Permit2__c ) ), OR( ISPICKVAL( MUSW__Permit2__r.MUSW__Type__c , 'Agricultural Water Withdrawal Application'), ISPICKVAL( MUSW__Permit2__r.MUSW__Type__c , 'Agricultural Water Withdrawal Permit'), ISPICKVAL( MUSW__Permit2__r.MUSW__Type__c , 'Application to Modify or Transfer an Agricultural Water Withdrawal Permit') ), MUSW__Permit2__r.AVO_Undocumented__c = False, OR( INCLUDES( MUSW__Permit2__r.AVO_Purpose_of_Water_Use__c, 'Irrigation Golf Course' ), INCLUDES( MUSW__Permit2__r.AVO_Purpose_of_Water_Use__c, 'Irrigation Athletic Field' ), INCLUDES( MUSW__Permit2__r.AVO_Purpose_of_Water_Use__c, 'Freeze/Frost Protection' ), INCLUDES( MUSW__Permit2__r.AVO_Purpose_of_Water_Use__c, 'Livestock/Poultry Watering' ), INCLUDES( MUSW__Permit2__r.AVO_Purpose_of_Water_Use__c, 'Other Agricultural Use' ), INCLUDES( MUSW__Permit2__r.AVO_Purpose_of_Water_Use__c, 'Aquaculture' ), INCLUDES( MUSW__Permit2__r.AVO_Purpose_of_Water_Use__c, 'Recreation Pond' ), INCLUDES( MUSW__Permit2__r.AVO_Purpose_of_Water_Use__c, 'Golf Courses' ) ), MUSW__Permit2__r.AVO_Permitted_Acres__c > 0, NOT( ISPICKVAL( MUSW__Permit2__r.AVO_Permit_Closed_Status__c , 'Cancelled Must Reapply' ) ), NOT( ISPICKVAL( MUSW__Permit2__r.AVO_Permit_Closed_Status__c , 'Relinquished' ) ), NOT( ISPICKVAL( MUSW__Permit2__r.AVO_Permit_Closed_Status__c , 'Revoked' ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Purpose of Water Use is Non-Irrigation and has Permitted Acres â€“ Check Data Entry
